OOC: Hot Rod wouldn't know top secret stuff, but he should know stuff
like layout, defences, weopons, amount of troops.

::Hot Rod::

He continued to sleep.

::DrillBit::

He started drilling through the ground, quickly. He kept his upper body
above ground. He came alongside, of KitKat.
"If I drill deep down, I could reach the ruins in 15 minutes. Want me
too?"
